title: Employer-Employee Relationship
description: We have a professional employer-employee relationship where trader4life works at my Public Dock at Fondamenta dei Burattini. Our relationship shows nearly neutral trust (48.57/100) but very low strength (1.13/100), suggesting minimal interaction beyond basic employment. There is a potential issue with one of my employees, Biagio Pugliese, being hungry which could affect productivity.
